alert.note: Alert for Wasatch Mountains I-80 North; Wasatch Mountains South of I-80 (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 05 at 2:03PM MST until January 08 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST THIS EVENING... ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY EVENING THROUGH LATE SUNDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 6 inches. For the Winter Storm Watch, heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 12 to 18 inches possible. * WHERE...Wasatch Mountains I-80 North and Wasatch Mountains South of I-80. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 11 PM MST this evening. For the Winter Storm Watch, from Saturday evening through late Sunday night. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions will continue through this evening. Expect widespread winter driving conditions across mountain routes Saturday evening into Sunday night. If traveling, be prepared for potential traction restrictions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov.
